# Test Document: Format V5 (Multi-Section)

This document has multiple independent reference sections.

## Section A: Genetics

Genetic testing is crucial for diagnosis[^1]. Family screening should follow[^2].

### Citations

[^1]: James CA, et al. International Evidence-Based Reappraisal of Genes Associated With ARVC. Circ Genom Precis Med. 2021. https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/33831308/
[^2]: Corrado D, et al. Diagnosis of arrhythmogenic cardiomyopathy. Int J Cardiol. 2020. https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32561223/

---

## Section B: Treatment

Treatment approaches vary by severity[^1]. Exercise restriction is often recommended[^2].

### References

[^1]: Towbin JA, et al. 2019 HRS expert consensus statement on ARVC. Heart Rhythm. 2019. https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/31078652/
[^2]: Pelliccia A, et al. 2020 ESC Guidelines on sports cardiology. Eur Heart J. 2021. https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32860412/
